revised_title: The Antiquity of Venereal Disease and Its Distinction from Leprosy
tldr: This article discusses the distinction between venereal disease and leprosy, arguing that they are two different diseases. The author refutes the claim that leprosy was brought to England from the Holy War and shows that the symptoms and transmission of venereal disease match those described in ancient times, while leprosy has different symptoms and was treated differently.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Medical History
